pr_title: Fix NPE on resetting configs with null default value

timeline.author: raiyni
timeline.diffHunk:

 		description = "Configures the highlight color of double hit spots",
 		position = 5

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
Assert.assertEquals(conf.nullDefaultKey(), null);
Assert.assertNull(conf.nullDefaultKey());

timeline.body: Shouldn't this just be `object == null ? null : object.toString()`?

timeline.bodyHTML: Shouldn't this just be object == null ? null : object.toString()?
